Html:
Hi,

If I have no internet connection, I switch to AccessMode.CacheOnly.
However if I then attempt to SetPositionByKeywords, I get the status error ExceptionInCode instead of G_GEO_SUCCESS. Strangely this does not happen when I switch to AccessMode.CacheOnly and there is an internet connection.

If I just ignore the error in these circumstances, everything seems to work OK. Should I be doing something different?

I am using GMap.Net 1.7.0
